metadata.synopsis:
In SwA, the owlbear cub speaks in short staccato 'sentences.' He's vicious and feral - but scared. If the player coaxes him with food or is nice to him, he will cautiously consider approaching - but is scared off before he gets too close.An owlbear cub - young, but still dangerous - appears in camp. The player has previously spared the cub after killing its mother, and saved it from a cruel game run by the goblins in their camp.
The cub is scared, and quick to run or attack - it's an untamed wild animal.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Repro steps:1. Start the game2. loadlevel WLD_Main_A3. oe qnight NIGHT_OwlbearCub1_43696ea8-3bff-440d-bee8-9cd912e4e8b44. End the day and go to camp5. Go to sleep, the dialog will start

32.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player wakes up in a middle of a night because the owlbear cub approaches it

117.speaker: Owlbear Cub
117.context: CinematicNodeContext: Faces the player, stamping a footNodeContext: As in: 'I want food! I'm hungry!"

25.speaker: Player
25.text: I have food. Would you like it?
25.context: CinematicNodeContext: Takes a tiny step forward.NodeContext: As in: 'Yes, I want it!'

130.context: CinematicNodeContext: Takes a tiny step forward.NodeContext: As in: 'Yes, I want it!'

120.text: Bah. Now that you've fed it, we'll never be rid of the beast.

41.speaker: Player
41.text: Bah. Now that you've fed it, we'll never be rid of the beast.

30.speaker: Player
30.text: Careful. Once that thing's eaten through the camp, it might start looking at you hungrily.
30.context: CinematicNodeContext: Walks up.NodeContext: The player is feeding an orphaned owlbear that's been accepted into the camp. Shadowheart observes and comments.

84.speaker: Player
84.text: Oh my gods, look at its little beak! C'mere, you doll...
84.context: CinematicNodeContext: Walks up.NodeContext: Beckoning to an owlbear, which she finds adorable.

123.speaker: Player
123.context: CinematicNodeContext: Walks up.NodeContext: Walking up to an owlbear cub

132.speaker: Player
132.text: When I see a creature as sweet as that, I hardly miss the Gate at all.

8.speaker: Player
8.text: The hand that feeds is the hand that's loved. It'll never leave your side now.

112.speaker: Owlbear Cub
112.text: It'll be back for more rations, mark my words.
